member.name: F:SysWeaver.CompressParams.OnlyBest
member.summary: If true, only the best compression method is saved

member.name: F:SysWeaver.CompressParams.OnlyBetter
member.summary: Skip a file if the compressed size is greater or equal to the original

member.name: F:SysWeaver.CompressParams.RecompressImages
member.summary: If true, image files such as png and jpeg may be re-compressed, trying to make smaller

member.name: F:SysWeaver.CompressParams.CopyOriginal
member.summary: If true, the original file is copied to the destination

member.name: F:SysWeaver.CompressParams.Methods
member.summary: The compression methods to use (br, zgip, zstd, deflate), or use "org" to copy the original (or the type compressed version)

member.name: F:SysWeaver.CompressParams.OptimizeWebFiles
member.summary: If true, .js files will be minimized

member.name: F:SysWeaver.CompressParams.OptimizeShaders
member.summary: If true, .glsl files will be optimized

member.name: F:SysWeaver.CompressParams.RemoveShaderVars
member.summary: If true, shader variables will be removed

member.name: M:SysWeaver.CompressProgram.OnAllGlobalConsts(System.String[],System.Func{System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String})
member.param: Line content, type, name, value, comment
